constraints.name: pairwise_exclusion
constraints.description: 每对元素中至少有一个满足特定条件（投票约束）

constraints.name: solution_existence
constraints.description: 存在一种方案使得所有约束同时满足（可解性约束）
constraints.formal: ∃solution such that all pairwise_exclusion constraints are satisfied

constraints.name: uniqueness_constraint
constraints.description: 每个元素的取值在所有可行解中必须一致（唯一性约束）
constraints.formal: ∀i, if bill i is Y in one solution, it must be Y in all solutions; similarly for N
